reviewText: Cheaply produced. Average women. Full nude views. Girls did try to entertain..
The reason 2 star is because there was only two fine parts on the DVD and it was only like 5minutes in all

I have to say, I wasn't expecting much out of this late-'90s release--especially after the first few minutes--but ended up pleasantly surprised. The rest of the women are better-looking than the one in the opening vignette, and even though several of the eight have that worn-out, late-'90s trailer-park thing happening, with horribly-misshapen fake breasts and flat butts, there are a few diamonds here. Unfortunately they all are basically unidentifiable, given only first names. No superstars in the cast because I probably would have recognized them more immediately if so.

The positives include FULL nudity of all cast members (even some brief explicit nudes), one very impressive set of implants and one all-natural gal with a pile-driver booty that really makes you sit up and take notice. There wasn't really a "pool party" by the way (only an idiot would care)--they make mention several times that it's actually February, plus the pool is pretty much disgusting. They couldn't have cleaned the thing before shooting? Mostly shot on the pool deck and hot tub.

The bonus footage is great--even better than the primary footage. Features Linda O'Neill, Lauren Hayes and several others, getting totally nude also.

Features eight well-endowed females as they show up at a pool party and disrobe in pairs to music. Then they get into a hot tub. It does not appear to be too warm the day they filmed. Also includes an additional twenty minutes of bonus footage of additional gals on display. Very good.
Its ok, the girls mostly just dance around

I really liked this dvd because the girls here enjoyed getting themselves naked. And perhaps its the only thing they are good at. Because they don't seem to be very bright. In fact most of the video is guided with lame music because probably these girls don't have a brain and therefore are unable to say anything profound or interesting at all. If you are a fan of porn it features adult film starlets Carolyn Monroe and Kiki Daire, back when they were in their twenties, very young. It is only 60 minutes long but the girls waste no time in taking their tops off. The nudity here is very abundant and done with grace and style. Nothing pornagraphic here. Also, on here  most girls have breast augmentation . BUT they don't have any tattoos, at least none that I was able to see. The shots of the girls in nude are very elegantly done with precise centering so you won't have to pause any shots when enjoying this video, wink wink* and I think most of you guys out there know what I talking about :-)

The women they invited to this party are all gorgeous and sexy, and yes, most of the time they're totally nude as advertised. Yet although the title is "Nude Pool Party," there's not a lot of that going on. Most of the time the ladies are stripping and posing for the camera, instead of something you'd do at a pool party like swimming or playing water volleyball or whatever. These women do know how to pose well, for sure. There are several scenes with the ladies in a hot tub, so that's natural looking, and they're playing in the water a little bit too, so there is some partying going on here. The "20 minutes of bonus footage" is more posing somewhere else. So if you want to see a lot of sexy posing, and a little partying, give this 4 stars. In fact, I would have given it 4 stars except that the picture quality is not great, and not very sharp, especially on my new high definition TV. By the way, the company that made this video, DGD, did a great one called you see Nude Basketball / Nude Football with many of these same great-looking ladies playing those games in the buff. Amazon has it for sale too.
